remarks.format: ## Remarks 未定义其自己的呈现行为;实例化实际在代码或标记中的类实例是可能的但显示在中为 nothing[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 does not yet define its own rendering behavior; instantiating an actual class instance in code or markup is possible but displays nothing in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 必须通过执行的类提供呈现逻辑子元素作为其内容模型的一部分或位于派生的类。Rendering logic must be provided by classes that take child elements as part of their content model, or in derived classes. 有意与许多相同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]作为。 deliberately parallels many of the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] as . 请注意，某些[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上找到不会等效。Note that certain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] found on will not have a equivalent. 多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]是获取功能，如几何表示形式或布局，其中不相关的。Several of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] are for functionality such as geometry representation or layout, which are not relevant for a . 大多数现有将在派生的类中找到命名空间。The majority of existing derived classes will be found in the namespace. 许多这些派生类实现用于流文档模型元素。Many of these derived classes implement elements for the flow document model. 某些派生的类，如具有一些类似控件的功能，但派生自以便类似控件的元素仍可以参与流文档模型。Certain derived classes such as have some control-like functionality, but are derived from such that the control-like elements can still participate in the flow document model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在另一个进程循环访问逻辑树时调用此方法可以引发异常。This method can throw an exception if called at a time when the logical tree is being iterated by another process. 大多数派生的类公开的负责包含专用的集合 (例如，上类;上类)。Most derived classes expose dedicated collections that are responsible for containment (for example, on the class; on the class). 通常可以避免无需直接操作逻辑树，改为从这些类派生。You can typically avoid any need to manipulate the logical tree directly if you derive from these classes instead. 使用为内容元素的逻辑树是一个高级的方案，可能需要专用的分析器或专用，它作为父呈现元素 （内容主机）。Working with the logical tree for content elements is an advanced scenario that may require a specialized parser or a specialized that acts as the parent rendering element (content host). 有关如何使用详细信息并，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information about how to use and , see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).

span.para: 重写此方法以提供您的元素在元素加载过程中在初始化之前应发生的特殊处理。您的实现应调用基实现，因为基本 （默认值） 实现设置要跟踪的初始化一些内部标志。基实现将引发异常，如果称为不止一次在同一个元素之前到达。

Override this method to provide special handling that should occur before your element is initialized during the element loading process. Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization. The base implementation will throw an exception if is called more than one time on the same element prior to reaching .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用的签名`isControllable`，参数，或指定该参数时`false`，一旦它达到"填充"期删除与该动画关联的时间线时钟。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period. 因此不能运行一次后重新启动动画。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once. 请注意，控制动画还要求情节提要是已命名或在代码中实例的可访问性。Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用的签名`isControllable`，参数，或指定该参数时`false`，一旦它达到"填充"期删除与该动画关联的时间线时钟。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period. 因此不能运行一次后重新启动动画。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once. 请注意，控制动画还要求情节提要是已命名或在代码中实例的可访问性。Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code. ## 使用组合 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 当应用， ，或到通过使用属性 ，则所有之前与该属性相关联的对象继续消耗系统资源时，计时系统将执行不自动删除时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property by using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically. 若要避免出现性能问题，通过使用应用大量时钟时，它们完成后，您应该从属性的基值删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有几种方法来移除时钟：There are several ways to remove a clock: - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请使用或经过动画处理的对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定要进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从属性中删除所有的动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定从列表中的时钟，使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只有根时钟可以受;属性的子时钟返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间将永远不会引发事件。Note also that the event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 垃圾回收对象时，它的时钟也会断开连接和垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可用于验证对象的多个属性的值。A can be used to validate the values of multiple properties of an object. 例如，假设应用程序提示用户输入地址，然后填充类型的对象`Address`，其中包含属性`Street`， `City`， `ZipCode`，和`Country`，使用值的用户提供。For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address and then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序必须包含四个面板控件，其中每个绑定到对象的属性之一。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is bound to one of the object’s properties. 可以使用中验证`Address`对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 例如，可以确保 zip 代码是有效的国家/地区的地址。For example, the can ensure that the zip code is valid for the country of the address. 子元素继承从其父元素，就像使用任何其他可继承属性。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取消关闭上下文菜单，该事件的处理程序应将其标记为已处理。To suppress closing context menus, handlers of the event should mark it as handled. 若要将此事件用作在样式中，必须引用基础服务的事件标识符：To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuClosing](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuclosing)] (这种用法是必需的因为上的事件实现，公开基础的服务事件未正确映射在触发器中使用的标识符)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the identifier for use in triggers). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例实现的处理程序上的命名区域更改光标`DisplayArea`（未显示）。The following example implements a handler that changes the cursor over a named region `DisplayArea` (not shown). 注释暗示使用情况，实际上，此示例将是相同，但如果`DisplayArea`了。The comment hints at a usage, but in fact this sample would be identical if `DisplayArea` were a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件时创建事件标识符对象 (请参阅)，用于添加类处理程序 (请参阅)。Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see ) and can then be used to add class handlers (see ). 标识符对象包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要手动打开上下文菜单，事件的处理程序应将相关的事件标记为已处理。To manually open context menus, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled. 否则为现有值属性将用于自动打开上下文菜单。Otherwise, the existing value of the property will be used to automatically open a context menu. 将标记处理的事件将有效地取消默认操作，并且可重置的值的机会属性，然后打开新。Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the property and then open the new . 但是，是应注意的计时问题。However, there is a timing issue you should be aware of. 若要完全替换通过上下文菜单处理程序中，初始上下文菜单不能为 null / 空。In order to completely replace the context menu through a handler, the initial context menu must not be null / empty. 或者，您可能需要处理的事件，然后手动打开新的上下文菜单。Alternatively, you might need to handle the event and then manually open a new context menu. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 处理 ContextMenuOpening 事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md)。For details, see [How to: Handle the ContextMenuOpening Event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md). 若要将此事件用作在样式中，必须引用基础服务的事件标识符：To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuOpening](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuopening)] (这种用法是必需的因为上的事件实现，公开基础的服务事件未正确映射在触发器中使用的标识符)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the identifier for use in triggers). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器将依赖类型转换为类来计算该字符串。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor relies on type conversion for the class to evaluate the string. 所提供的字符串的计算结果应为值。The provided string should evaluate to a value. 有关详细信息，请参阅。See for details. 此属性所建立的光标将还是将不会显示在鼠标指针位于此元素上时也是依赖于的值属性。Whether the cursor as established by this property will or will not display when the mouse pointer is over this element is also dependent on the value of the property. 此外，与事件相关的注意事项，如活动拖动、 鼠标捕获、 文本编辑模式中控件和等等，还将影响游标，并且其优先级高于此属性中指定的值。Also, event-related considerations such as an active drag, mouse capture, text editing modes within controls, and so on, will also affect the cursor with higher priority than the value you specify in this property. 若要还原的此属性设置为最终的默认行为，请将其设置为`null`试。To revert the behavior of setting this property to the eventual default, set it to `null` again. `null`默认值实际上意味着确定实际游标值的此处延迟，并且应从其他位置获取。The `null` default really means that determination of the practical cursor value is deferred here and should be obtained from elsewhere. 如果不存在以编程方式值来自任何源默认游标通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序将是一个箭头。If presented with no programmatic values from any source, the default cursor over a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application will be an arrow. 每个移动的鼠标悬停[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序将引发事件。Each movement of the mouse over a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application raises a event. 该事件冒泡，并且路由中的任何元素都有机会处理事件并设置游标通过此事件的参数的值。The event bubbles, and any element along the route has the opportunity to handle the event and to set the value of the cursor via the arguments of this event. 如果发生这种情况，则表明事件进行处理，并且 in 实参具有一个更改的值将优先于的值属性在任何级别，除非设置。If that happens, the fact that the event is handled and has a changed value in the arguments takes precedence over the value of the property at any level, unless is set. 如果不创建自定义光标，通常您将此属性设置的静态属性值类。If not creating a custom cursor, typically you set this property to a static property value of the class. 设置在部分信任环境中未启用为自定义值。Setting the to a custom value is not enabled in partial trust. 自定义光标的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on custom cursors, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks *数据上下文*是允许将信息从其父元素继承有关用于绑定，以及其他特征等路径的绑定的绑定源元素的概念。*Data context* is a concept that allows elements to inherit information from their parent elements about the binding source that is used for binding, as well as other characteristics of the binding such as the path. 可以直接设置数据上下文[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象，并且将绑定到该对象的属性计算。Data context can be set directly to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, with the bindings evaluating to properties of that object. 或者，可以将数据上下文设置为对象。Alternatively, you can set the data context to a object. 此依赖属性继承属性值。This dependency property inherits property values. 如果没有与任何其他值的子元素建立通过本地值或样式，属性系统将设置此值为分配有此值最接近的父元素的值。If there are child elements with no other value for established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned. 或者，可以使用以下属性之一类来显式指定绑定源： ， ，或。Alternatively, you can use one of the following properties of the class to specify the binding source explicitly: , , or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 指定绑定源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md). 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，通常设置为声明。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], is most commonly set to as a declaration. 您可以使用属性元素语法或特性语法。You can use either property element syntax or attribute syntax. 特性语法在此页上的示例所示。Attribute syntax is shown in the example on this page. 您还可以设置在代码中。You can also set in code. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据上下文和数据绑定的说明，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For an explanation of data contexts and data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当元素的可能受影响的更改，此元素上的所有数据绑定属性。When an element's changes, all data-bound properties on this element are potentially affected. 这适用于任何元素属于当前元素的子代元素继承数据上下文，以及当前元素本身。This applies to any elements that are descendant elements of the current element, which inherit the data context, and also the current element itself. 所有此类绑定重新解释的新以反映在绑定中的新值。All such bindings re-interpret the new to reflect the new value in bindings. 相对于引发这些更改的顺序不能保证事件。There is no guarantee made about the order of these changes relative to the raising of the event. 事件后或在任意组合，可以在事件之前发生的更改。The changes can occur before the event, after the event, or in any mixture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、 样式几乎始终定义为资源，而不是作为一个元素，内联和资源，通常是作为引用。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], styles are almost always defined as a resource, rather than inline as an element, and that resource is usually referenced as a . 请注意，此属性会影响视觉外观，但不会报告此元数据中。Note that this property affects visual appearance but does not report so in metadata. 这是因为可视外观更改是事件驱动和在任何时候，可能不适用，因此通常不应报告元数据中的任何视觉对象或布局信息。This is because the visual appearance change is event-driven and may not apply at all times, and thus should not generally report any visual or layout information in metadata. 从概念上讲，焦点应用于控件的可视行为应一致元素元素。Conceptually, the visual behavior of focus applied to a control should be coherent from element to element. 强制实施一致性的最合理方法是仅当您在创作整个主题更改焦点视觉样式。The most sensible way to enforce coherence is to only change the focus visual style if you are composing an entire theme. 在单个样式上而不是作为主题的一部分设置此属性不可此属性的预期的用法，因为它可能会导致混乱的用户体验与键盘焦点有关。Setting this property on individual styles and not as part of a theme is not the intended usage of this property, because it may lead to a confusing user experience regarding keyboard focus. 如果你想是故意不一致的整个主题的特定于元素的行为，更好的方法是使用触发器在样式中的个别输入的状态属性，如或，并为此，在没有一种方法以可视方式会影响任何现有的焦点视觉样式。If you are intending element-specific behavior that is deliberately not coherent across a theme, a much better approach is to use triggers in styles for individual input state properties, such as or , and to do so in a way that does not visually interfere with any existing focus visual style. 有关详细信息的设计意图及替代焦点属性，请参阅[控件，以及 FocusVisualStyle 中的焦点设置样式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md)。For more information on the design intention of and alternative focus properties, see [Styling for Focus in Controls, and FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最常见用法是指定时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]标记中的元素名称。The most common usage of this property is when specifying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element name in markup. 此属性实质上是提供一个 WPF 框架级便捷属性来设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。This property essentially provides a WPF framework-level convenience property to set the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md). 获取从代码并不常用，因为如果已在代码中具有适当的引用，只需调用方法和属性在元素上的引用且通常并不需要。Getting a from code is not common, because if you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and do not generally need the . 例外情况是字符串具有某些重载的含义，例如用于中显示该名称是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。An exception is if the string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 设置从代码如果原始已从标记中的设置也不建议，并更改该属性不会更改的对象引用。Setting a from code if the original was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property will not change the object reference. 仅当过程中显式创建基础名称范围时，会创建此类对象引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]加载。Such object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading. 具体而言，必须调用以进行有效的更改上已加载元素的属性。You must specifically call to make an effective change on the property of an already loaded element. 一个值得一提设置情况从代码很重要是用于对运行演示图板将命名元素。One notable case where setting from code is important is for naming elements that storyboards will run against. 可以注册名称之前，可能还需要实例化并分配实例。Before you can register a name, might also need to instantiate and assign a instance. 请参阅示例部分中，或[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。See the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 设置从代码具有有限的应用程序，但按名称查找元素，则更容易，尤其是当采用一种导航模型的页面重新加载到应用程序和运行时代码不一定是的代码隐藏相应的页。Setting from code has limited applications, but looking up an element by name is more common, particularly if you are employing a navigation model where pages reload into the application and the run-time code is not necessarily the code-behind of that respective page. 实用程序方法，这是可从任何，可以找到的任何元素中该元素的逻辑树以递归方式。The utility method , which is available from any , can find any element by in that element's logical tree recursively. 也可以使用的静态方法，其还会字符串作为参数。Or you can use the static method of , which also takes the string as an argument. 常用根元素 (，例如) 实现该接口。Commonly used root elements (, for example) implement the interface . 此接口的实现需要强制实施的名称会明确其作用域内。Implementations of this interface are expected to enforce that names be unambiguous within their scope. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法的情况下，仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 On \* 方法： 它提供了方法来处理从派生类的类处理程序而不是实例处理程序匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能由子元素，不一定是将调用处理程序的元素引发。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现必须考虑该事件参数的源属性 （并且不应尝试重新引发该事件在大多数情况下）。Therefore, your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类无法选择路由收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是采用的事件自变量并谨慎地将事件标记为已处理来缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法的情况下，仍应调用 base （）。You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 On \* 方法： 它提供了方法来处理从派生类的类处理程序而不是实例处理程序匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能由子元素，不一定是将调用处理程序，因此您的实现将需要采取的事件参数的源的元素引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试重新引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类无法选择路由收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是采用的事件自变量并谨慎地将事件标记为已处理来缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应以通常将检测到属性更改或失效。This method is not intended to generally detect property changes or invalidations. 它改为适用于修改常规失效模式如果特定的信息了解了宽分类的属性。It is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties. 调用此方法可能很多时候一个对象的生命周期内。This method is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object. 因此，可以实现更好的性能，如果重写特定属性的元数据，然后将附加或各个属性的函数。Therefore, you can achieve better performance if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach or functions for individual properties. 但是，应使用此方法，如果包括大量的值相关的依赖项属性，或如果它包含逻辑，例如呈现行为，必须重新运行多个相关的属性失效的情况。However, you would use this method if a includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations. 请注意，没有具有相同名称`OnPropertyChanged`具有不同签名的方法 (参数类型是)，可能出现在多个类。Note that there is an identically named `OnPropertyChanged` method with a different signature (the parameter type is ) that can appear on a number of classes. 是否`OnPropertyChanged`用于数据对象通知，并且是为协定的一部分。That `OnPropertyChanged` is used for data object notifications, and is part of the contract for .

span.para: 始终调用基实现中，您的实现中的第一个操作。如果不这样做将大大禁用整个 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 属性系统，这会导致不正确的值报告。

Always call the base implementation, as the first operation in your implementation. Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, which causes incorrect values to be reported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法的情况下，仍应调用 base （）。You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 On \* 方法： 它提供了方法来处理从派生类的类处理程序而不是实例处理程序匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能由子元素，不一定是将调用处理程序，因此您的实现将需要采取的事件参数的源的元素引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试重新引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类无法选择路由收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是采用的事件自变量并谨慎地将事件标记为已处理来缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，具体取决于应用程序的功能，可能发生更改的元素的逻辑父级保留此属性的值将不反映所做的更改。Note that the logical parent of an element can potentially change depending on your application functionality, and keeping the value of this property will not reflect that change. 需要它之前，通常应获取的值。You typically should get the value immediately before you need it. 请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)有关遍历逻辑树和方案其中采用针对元素发现这种方法相应的详细信息。See [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md) for more information about traversing logical trees, and the scenarios where taking this approach towards element discovery is appropriate. 属性系统将后可能重新计算所有属性值的元素父级，因为某些属性继承值到逻辑树。The property system will potentially recalculate all property values of an element when it is reparented, because some properties inherit values through the logical tree. 适用于绑定可以还元素的父级更改。The that applies for bindings can also change when elements are reparented. 更改元素的父级通常只能通过集合的操作，通过使用专用添加或删除方法，或通过设置内容属性的元素。Changing an element's parent is typically only done through manipulation of collections, by using dedicated add or remove methods, or through setting content properties of elements. 使用的最典型情形属性将获取的引用，然后获取各种从父对象的属性值。The most typical scenario for using the property is to obtain a reference and then get various property values from the parent. 对于模板，模板的最终将`null`。For templates, the of the template eventually will be `null`. 若要忽略这一点并扩展到实际应用了模板的逻辑树，请使用。To get past this point and extend into the logical tree where the template is actually applied, use . ## Examples 以下示例检查以查看是否的的特定类型。The following example checks to see whether the of a is of a particular type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是调用的便捷方法。This method is a convenience method for calling . 该实现将检查后续父元素，直到它找到的适用实现，它可以通过查找的元素，实现。The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements . 有关名称范围的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML 名称范围](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 调用为正确挂钩的应用程序时在代码中创建动画演示图板是必需的。Calling is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code. 这是因为其中一个主要的演示图板属性，使用运行时名称查找而不是要采用对目标元素的引用。This is because one of the key storyboard properties, , uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element. 即使该元素是通过从代码引用可访问，这是如此。This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code. 为什么需要注册名称的情节提要目标的详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 为内容元素的动画是比动画在控件上，不太常见[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)重点介绍控制方案。Animations for content elements are less common than animations on controls, the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md) concentrates on control scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以完全或部分中定义的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常创建为属性元素中，并且通常是针对任何单独的页面或应用程序的根元素上。Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application. 在此级别将资源字典可以更轻松地找到从页面中的各个子元素 （或从任何页上，在应用程序的情况下）。Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case). 在大多数应用程序方案中，我们建议样式定义为使用的资源字典中的对象元素或定义为外部资源中，以便整个样式资源可以是自包含 （此方法有助于单独设计器从开发人员的责任由分隔的物理文件，需要编辑职责）。In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited). 请注意，此属性返回该元素内直接声明仅的资源字典。Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element. 这是不同于实际资源查找过程，其中的子元素可以访问任何向上递归搜索每个父元素中定义的资源。This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards. 资源还可以通过从集合中的代码引用，但请注意在创建资源[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]绝对不可访问，直到引起声明该字典的元素。Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after is raised by the element that declares the dictionary. 实际上，资源以异步方式进行分析，甚至不能事件是可以引用保障[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源。In fact, resources are parsed asynchronously, and not even the event is an assurance that you can reference a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resource. 出于此原因，通常只应访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义的资源作为的一部分运行时代码，或通过其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]技术，如样式或特性值的资源扩展引用。For this reason you should generally only access [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resources as part of run-time code, or through other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] techniques such as styles or resource extension references for attribute values. 当通过代码访问资源时，它在实质上是等效于从进行的引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。When you access resources through code, it is essentially equivalent to a reference made from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 基础支持添加、 删除，或通过使用代码查询从集合中的资源所需的方法。The underlying supports the methods required to add, remove, or query resources from within the collection by using code. 属性是可以设置以支持此方案的完全替换的元素是一个新的或不同的资源集合。The property is settable to support the scenario of completely replacing the resources collection of an element to be a new or different . 请注意，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的语法不包含的元素。Notice that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown does not include an element for the . 这是隐式集合语法; 的示例表示集合元素的标记，则可以省略。This is an example of implicit collection syntax; a tag representing the collection element can be omitted. 改为指定作为项目添加到集合的元素。The elements that are added as items to the collection are specified instead. 有关隐式集合的详细信息和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[XAML 语法详述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about implicit collections and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 一种情况下，元素是引入合并的字典，这种情况下是否存在通常没有子元素，如仍指定显式。One case where a is still specified explicitly as an element is if you are introducing a merged dictionary, in which case there are typically no child elements for that . 有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。For details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceElements**oneOrMoreResourceElements* 一个或多个对象元素，其中每个定义的资源。One or more object elements, each of which defines a resource. 在每个每个资源属性元素必须具有唯一值[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)，从检索值时，它可作为唯一键。Each resource property element within each must have a unique value for the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md), which serves as the unique key when values are retrieved from the . ## Examples 下面的示例建立上的收集根元素。The following example establishes a collection on a root element. 是一个典型的选择，因为它是一个将少数作为根元素和资源有意义的类通常存储在页面根或更高级别的如在应用程序。 is a typical choice because it is one of the few classes that make sense as a root element, and resources are generally stored at the page root or at even higher levels such as in the application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从主题设置，或从通常由资源在页面或应用程序级别 （隐式样式） 应用于该类型的对象的样式的默认样式通常提供当前样式。The current style is often provided by a default style from theming, or from styles generally applied to objects of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style). 此属性不会设置或返回默认 （主题） 样式，但它确实会隐式样式或显式样式。This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return the implicit style or an explicit style. 如果存在隐式或显式样式，并不重要是否访问作为资源或本地定义的样式。In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is accessed as a resource or defined locally. 设置样式存在一些限制。Setting the styles has some restrictions. 你可以重置整个属性设置为一个新在任何时候，这将强制布局重新组合。You can reset the entire property to a new at any time, which will force a layout recomposition. 但是，一旦加载的元素，该样式放置在使用应被视为密封。However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the should be considered sealed. 尝试对正在使用样式的任何单个属性进行更改 (如的在集合中的任何内容) 会导致引发异常。Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of ) causes an exception to be thrown. 在标记中定义的样式被视为一旦加载从资源字典 （适用于资源），或包含在页面加载 （适用于内联样式），可使用。A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles). 是具有特殊的优先顺序的依赖项属性。 is a dependency property with special precedence. 本地设置样式通常在进行操作的最高优先级属性系统中。The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system. 如果期间加载属性系统检查隐式样式定义指定该类型的资源作为在此情况下，为 null。If the is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles as defined resources that specify that type. 如果样式是完成此步骤后仍然为 null 则样式来自默认 （主题） 样式，但默认样式中不会返回属性值。If the style is still null after this step, then the style comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the property value. 请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模板实际上是共享的对象，其中只有一次创建模板的内容。Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once. 因此，如果您获得来自模板的元素的对象引用，可能会发现明显的逻辑树不会访问到页面根。Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root. 若要连接到该页面的逻辑树这样的模板引用，应会看到值并继续根据需要该元素树中导航。In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired. 通常会`null`对常见对象，因为如果您通过典型方式在应用程序中获取从页面外的对象引用，该元素可能不从创建模板。 will frequently be `null` for common objects, because if you have obtained an object reference from out of a page in your application through typical means, that element probably was not created from a template. 事例可能不是`null`将包括处理某些低级别的输入事件，或使用枚举器返回了来自模板的元素的命中测试的事件等操作。Cases where might not be `null` would include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, or working with enumerators, which may have returned elements that came from templates.
